item.description:
Let's check out McCormick and Schmick's in PARK SQUARE for their Happy Hour Menu, which is valid from 3:30 PM until 6:30 PM. You must purchase a beverage in order to receive the Happy Hour Menu prices. It's Tuesday so they they also offer $1 oysters.

******WARNING WARNING WARNING******
******PARK SQUARE location******


Join fellow drinking buddies for conversation, laughs and good cheap eats.

I'll get there at 4 and hang until 8. You're welcome to arrive when you can and hang as long as you're able.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Arlington (green line) is closest, less than (ten (10) minute walk) subway station. Chinatown (orange line) subway station is less than a fifteen (15) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a black cloth headband and a full length black sleeveless dress seated in the bar area playing the card game solitaire.
item.name: Happy Meal Happy Hour at McCormick & Schmick's
